channel.title: Webpage Release
channel.description:
Here is a side project I've been working on. I gave this to Embattled for their server but I figured I'll just release it to everyone.
Features: - Cool features with webkit (displays correctly in IE, Chrome, and Firefox) - Nivo Slider ([b]Note:[/b] There is an error with firefox that I don't feel like fixing) - Simple and Clean look - Neat, well commented code
Picture: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2lm0uuh.png[/img]
I half-assed the header so it doesn't look that great.
Download:
http://www.mediafire.com/?cdt2ecd8xushz4b

item.title: Webpage Release
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:3, topic:452928”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=555789.msg4068826#msg4068826 date=1344168956]
More or less the same thing I said on R-S ;3

Good job though, the header could be better.
[/quote]

Thinking about it after the fact I could have added facebook/twitter/rss feed icons to the top right header.[/quote]

Not just that, you could’ve had a better colour choice, then made the logo a little smaller and centred it over the top of a navbar.

The navbar could’ve been more varied too.

There’s a whole list that could be done :).

Read full topic

item.title: Webpage Release
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Here is a side project I’ve been working on. I gave this to Embattled for their server but I figured I’ll just release it to everyone.

Features:

  • Cool features with webkit (displays correctly in IE, Chrome, and Firefox)
  • Nivo Slider (Note: There is an error with firefox that I don’t feel like fixing)
  • Simple and Clean look
  • Neat, well commented code

Picture:

2lm0uuh.png954×1142

I half-assed the header so it doesn’t look that great.

Download:

http://www.mediafire.com/?cdt2ecd8xushz4b
